name: Beware the Eyes
description:
Vanquish a castle infected with Eyes. Consume flesh. Live forever.

Notes:

The web version does not perform well, at least on my laptop. Native build highly recommended. The sound mixing is all over the place. That and more detail in the environments are the main things I'd like to expand on.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Look: Mouse

Fire: Left Mouse Button

Dash: Right Mouse Button

Menu: Escape

Credits:

Design, modeling, and programming by Riley Miller

Textures and SFX courtesy of the fine folks at Libre Quake

Skybox

Last but not least music courtesy of Alexander Ehlers
